title: The Visit to Aunt Ruth's
description: Bobby does not want to stay at Aunt Ruth's house. He thinks he'll be bored and she smells. However, Bobby finds that being with his Aunt Ruth is actually fun.

title: Uncle Ted's Excellent Adventure
description: Uncle Ted and Bobby decide to have a camp out in the back yard. This is Bobby's first time sleeping outside and he does not know if he is ready and is frightened. In the end, the whole family ends up "roughing it" with Bobby and Uncle Ted.

title: Adventures in Bobby Sitting
description: Bobby and Derek are upset because they are getting a babysitter. Things turn out better than they expect as they have lots of fun.

title: The Best One of the Mall
description: Bobby goes with his family to the mall and ends up getting lost. Chaos pursues as they search to find him.

title: My Dad Can Fix Anything
description: Bobby's dad tries to fix a plumbing problem in the house...with out much luck.

title: Me and Roger
description: Roger runs away because he has to go to the veterinarian, in the end all is well as he makes it to his appointment.

title: The Big Sweep
description: Bobby helps with spring cleaning and tries to find fun new ways to "clean the house".

title: The Night of the Living Pumpkin
description: It's Halloween and Bobby is too little to go trick or treating, so Uncle Ted helps Bobby turn the house into a Halloween House of Horror.

title: Beach Blanket Bobby
description: Uncle Ted takes the family out on his new boat and they end up stranded on an uncharted island.

title: The Revenge of Dr. Noo
description: Bobby watches a scary movie on TV about a character named "Dr. Noo" -- when he gets sick and Uncle Ted takes him to see a "new doctor", Bobby is petrified thinking he means Dr. Noo.

title: In Search of the Ring Bear
description: Bobby goes with his family to a relative's wedding, having the dubious distinction of ring bearer. Trouble ensues as the family makes there way to the wedding.

title: See America Last
description: The family goes on a road trip to the Grand Canyon. Unfortunately, the trip doesn't go as smoothly as Howie thought it would.

title: Bobby's Big Broadcast
description: Bobby goes to the museum with Uncle Ted and finds himself dreaming of Cartoons starring himself in "classic" episodes that the audience will enjoy.

title: Three Kids and a Baby
description: Bobby's mom tells the family that she is pregnant. Bobby starts to wonder where babies come from. He then starts to worry that he no longer has a place in the house.

title: Suspects, Lies & Videotape
description: When Derek and Kelly are too busy to put in Bobby's Captain Squash videotape, Bobby decides to put it in himself - even though he is too young to use the VCR. In doing so he breaks Martha's prized Elvis bust!

title: Clubhouse Bobby
description: Bobby invites his friends to join his new club. However, when he forbids someone from joining, his parents move in.

title: Nightmare on Bobby's Street
description: Bobby notices a mysterious house on his block, and becomes scared to go near it...until he meets the man who lives there.

title: Caution: Bobby at Work
description: Bobby goes to work with his dad and learns the "ins and outs" of his job!

title: Total Recess
description: Bobby realizes that he might actually like Jackie.

title: Chariots of Bobby
description: Bobby competes in a neighborhood olympics. Things turn sour when his family starts putting too much pressure on him to win.

title: Bobby's Birthday Bash
description: It is Bobby's birthday and he is ready to celebrate!

title: Bobby's Tooth or Dare
description: Bobby goes for his first dental checkup, accompanied by Derek, Kelly, and Uncle Ted. When Bobby finds out about the Tooth Fairy, he schemes to hit the jackpot by swiping Aunt Ruth's dentures and placing them underneath his pillow!

title: Bobby's Big Move
description: When Martha and Howie decide its time to move to a bigger house, Bobby and Kelly team up to sabotage the whole thing so they won't have to leave their friends.

title: Bad News Bobby
description: Bobby learns how to play T-ball.

title: Swim by Me
description: Bobby learns to swim in a public pool and meets a new friend, Boo Bradley.

title: The Play's the Thing
description: Uncle Ted puts on a play. Bobby and the family are the performers, but all Bobby wants to do is sing!

title: Fish Tales
description: The Generics (Uncle Ted included) go camping in Canada, much to Derek and Kelly's dismay. Despite such setbacks as rain and boring fishing trips, Bobby determines to have as good a time as possible - and manages to meet some colorful locals along the way.

title: The Music
description: Bobby learns a life lesson from his friend Abe the crossing guard.

title: Misery Loves Company
description: Bobby has a sleepover at Gordon's house. Gordon breaks all of the rules, and when caught, he places all the blame on Bobby.

title: Bobby Phone Home
description: Bobby and Uncle Ted leave the house to take their housekeeper to a wedding. Little do they know that it is in Las Vegas. They are on an adventure to try and find a phone to call home to let them know where they are.

title: Baby Brother Blues
description: The baby is coming and Bobby is feeling left out because he's not getting any attention.

title: Bobby's Girl
description: Bobby is Jackie's Valentine.

title: Ill Effects
description: Bobby is getting jealous of the twins and decides to pretend that he is sick in order to get his Mom's attention.

title: I Want My Mommy
description: The family takes Martha to Magicland for Mother's Day.

title: The Hero
description: Bobby loses a new shoe while playing in a forbidden mud puddle, and it is picked up by a baby who had strayed from her home the night before. This leads the police to believe that Bobby had had a hand in "rescuing" her.

title: Uncle Ted's New Friend
description: Bobby is jealous of Uncle Ted's new friend Constance.

title: The World Accordion to Bobby
description: Martha and Aunt Ruth decided that it is time that Bobby take lessons in something, and come up with...the accordion? Laughed at by his siblings and total strangers, Bobby rebels - until he finds out that playing the accordion can be fun.

title: Bobby Ties the Knot
description: Bobby has a crush on his teacher.

title: Jets, Choo-Choos & Cars
description: Worn to a frazzle by looking after the Twins, Martha needs a break. Howie decides to send Derek and Bobby by plane to visit their grandmother for a while so Martha can get a bit of rest - but the boys miss their connecting flight!

title: Karate Bobby
description: Bobby learns Karate in order to protect himself against bullies, but his misuse of his new Karate skills get him in to trouble.

title: A Day with Dad
description: Bobby helps his dad and Uncle Ted fix the bathroom light so he can go to the amusement park.

title: Psycho Bobby
description: Bobby tries to create a statue of his mom for her birthday and comes across as acting very odd from eveyone elses point of view.

title: The Smell of a Tattletale
description: Bobby becomes tells the car pool moms what wrong things the other kids were doing.

title: It's My Party
description: Bobby is upset because Kelly's Sweet 16 birthday party is ruining his plans for Build-a-Fort Day.

title: One Clump or Two
description: Bobby tries to prove his friends innocence so that he can sleep over.

title: Bobby's Big Dream
description: Bobby goes out for an audition at the mall for a commercial.

title: Bobby, the Musical
description: The bad weather keeps the family inside the house where they all learn to that spending time together is fun.

title: Rebel Without a Clue
description: Bobby doesn't want to be a little kid anymore so he starts acting like a big kid.

title: Geriatric Park
description: Bobby goes to visit his Great Grandpa Generic.

title: Harry Takes a Powder
description: Bobby loses Jackie's Hamster, Harry.

title: Bobby's Big Boo-Boo
description: Bobby needs to get his tonsils removed.

title: Mom on Wheels
description: Bobby spends the day with his mom at her job at Big Roy's while his dad goes on a job interview.

title: Weekend at Teddie's
description: Bobby spends the weekend at Uncle Ted's, to take a break from his family. But it isn't what he expected.

title: Generics Under Construction
description: Bobby must figure out how to tidy up his family's remodeled house for a photographer.

title: Mrs. Noogiefire
description: When Howie and Martha need to go on an unexpected trip, they decide that they can't trust Uncle Ted to babysit, so they advertise for a nanny. Little do they know that the "perfect nanny" they end up hiring is none other than Ted in disguise.

title: Bobby Slicker
description: Martha wins a sweepstakes and the family gets to go to a Dude Ranch.

title: No Sale
description: Bobby tries to sell the most candy in the school candy sale so he can win pair of skates.

title: Who You Gonna Call...???
description: Bobby gets locked out of his house, and cannot figure out what he should do.

title: Starring Bobby
description: The TV is broken so Bobby acts out movies for Kelly and Derek.

title: The Truth About Aunt Ruth
description: Bobby learns lessons about telling the truth.

title: Bobby On-Line
description: The Generic family gets a computer and chaos ensues.

title: Bobby the Genius
description: A University Professor tells Bobby that he is a genius.

title: Hooked on Caps
description: Bobby discovers that he is good at playing caps.

title: Bobby's Last Stand
description: Bobby has to do chores to earn money to by the X-15 Super Saturating Soaker Hose

title: Miracle on 34th St. & Rural Route 1
description: Bobby learns the meaning of Christmas.

title: Just Plain Sleepless
description: Bobby thinks that Uncle Ted is lonely and tries to find him a wife.

title: Bobby, Lord of the Slopes
description: Uncle Ted takes the kids on a ski trip.

title: Time After Time
description: Bobby learns the concept of time.

title: Independence Bobby
description: Bobby tries to be independent and wants to get a buzz cut for the 4th of July.

title: Bobby the Candidate
description: Bobby runs for Class President.

title: Bad Manners Bobby
description: Bobby learns about the importance of manners.

title: Roger's Ransom
description: Bobby thinks that Roger is kidnapped and held for ransom.

title: Cooties
description: Bobby is worried that he has come down with a terrible desease....the cooties.

title: Promises, Promises
description: Bobby learns a lesson about keeping his word.

title: Generics and Indians
description: Bobby learns about the importance of Thanksgiving.

title: It's a Generic Life
description: Bobby takes care of the twins and learns that there not so bad after all.

title: Cruisin' Bobby
description: The family goes on a cruise and Bobby learns a lesson about practical jokes..

title: Dad's Big Day
description: Bobby tries to figure out what to get his dad for Father's Day.

title: Blue Eggs and Bobby
description: Bobby has the blues because he is too young to play with Kelly and Derek and their friends.

title: Back to the Furniture
description: Bobby gets in to trouble and gets "triple" punishment from his Dad,.
